Research

sps4lat

sps4lat is semi-parametric component separation code designed for the Large Aperture Telescope of the Simons Observatory (SO).

Rayleigh scattering of the CMB

Rayleigh scattering refers to the frequency-dependent scattering of CMB photons by neutral species formed during recombination.
